name: HIRE SOFI
description:
Dive into this exciting adventure with all the dogs from Doggoland!

This is an interactive portfolio, created for the purpose to finally get a job as a narrative game designer.

To run the game:

Download - Unzip - Play

To move - press Arrow Keys or WASD;

To jump - Space;

To talk to dogs - C;

[Dear Mac users, after downloading the game, unzip it and then right click → Open. You might do it twice]

Enjoy!
